title: Peacock Motif Vanki Armlet - Traditional Andhra Baju Bandh
materials: Emerald. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Intricately designed armlet showcasing a peacock motif at the center. Embellished with brilliant-cut diamonds in a delicate floral pattern on the sides. The center features a traditional peacock design with inlaid ruby and emerald gemstones. Handcrafted with exquisite detail and a meticulous attention to symmetry, reflecting the artistry of South Indian craftsmanship. The traditional ‘vanki’ design is elevated with a touch of modern elegance through the diamond accents.
occasions: or any festive occasion. A stunning addition to a Bharatnatyam or Kuchipudi performance ensemble. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: This Vanki armlet is more than just jewelry; it's a piece of art. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, prosperity, and grace, making it an auspicious adornment for special occasions. The combination of traditional design and sparkling diamonds creates a timeless appeal. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, it showcases the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and durability, making it an heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. The adjustable design offers a comfortable and secure fit.
